name: Captain Kalliope Flies Again!
description:
Captain Kalliope has once again been captured by her arch nemesis, and once again has knocked out a dozen guards to escape on the experimental QT31 Biplane. See how far she can make it before she gets shot down and taken back to her cell.

Use the arrow keys to move

Z to fire if not in hyper mode, otherwise you fire automatically

X to select a few menu bits.

Shoot anything that moves.

If you run out of ammunition, the QT31 will helpfully switch to another completely random weapon at its disposal

Pick up crates to either restore your ammunition, or switch to a random weapon.

Take damage and you'll enter crisis mode. After a few seconds, the QT31 will extinguish any fires and repair itself to nearly new, do this too many times however, or get hit again while repairing, and its down in flames.

Helpfully, the QT31 will fire most of its weapons as fast as possible while in crisis mode.

Hypermode is recommended for a first try.

Made for the strange pact secret Santa gift jam 2022
